title: Vaibhavam Bangle - Emerald & Diamond Embellished Kangan
features: Features an intricate filigree design handcrafted with skilled Hyderabadi karigars. The central square-cut Emerald is surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds, adding brilliance and charm. The bangle's design has scrolling floral motifs.
occasions: or any special occasion. Also makes a stunning statement piece for modern festive attire.
description: Exquisite blend of traditional and contemporary design. High-quality emerald and diamond setting ensuring lasting brilliance. Handcrafted in Hyderabad by master artisans, reflecting a legacy of craftsmanship and cultural heritage (parampara). A treasure to cherish for generations.
